attributes.action: work with The Football Association to create a 5% levy on all player transfers of over £500,000, the proceeds of which will be used to support the grassroots of the game.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Premiership teams are spending ever growing sums of money on buying players, whilst the lower tiers of the game struggle to survive.

The levy would provide much needed funding and resources for youth, womens, amateur and lower league sectors of the game and might act as a brake on the currently ridiculous rise in transfer fees.

It would be good to know that when a player moves for £50 million in the next transfer window, that £1 million of that transfer will be coming back to the place where the game really lives - in our communities.
